name: AVIATION EXCHANGE GROUP, S.L
about: Aviation Exchange Group, S.L., based in Malaga, Spain, is an EASA Approved Training Organization (E-ATO-299) specializing in the finest training for regional aircraft. We offer comprehensive training programs for the EMB 170/190 and ATR 72-500 and ATR 72-600, utilizing highly sophisticated Level D full flight simulators and other state-of-the-art training devices. Our highly experienced instructors provide the highest quality instruction, and we serve as a global one-stop-shop for all aviation training and support needs, including TRI/TRE support and recurrent simulator training for airlines. We are committed to delivering exceptional training and recruitment solutions for ATR, Embraer, Airbus, and Boeing operators. With a focus on quality and industry-leading standards, Aviation Exchange Group ensures that our trainees are well-prepared for their careers in aviation.
services:
["EASA EMB170 TYPE RATING COURSE / ZFTT
EMB170/190 REFRESHER COURSE
EASA ATR42/72 TYPE RATING COURSE
ATR500 TO 600 DIFFERENCES COURSE
ATR72-600 TYPE RATING COURSE INDIAN DGCA
ATR42/72 TRI COURSE
ATR42/72 REFRESHER COURSE
MULTI CREW COOPERATION (MCC)
JET ORIENTATION COURSE (JOC)"]
